sentence.text: However, the inherent susceptibility of these tissues to mitochondrial respiratory chain complex IV assembly mutations and the clinical heterogeneity observed across SCO1 pedigrees remain poorly understood phenomena.

entity.text: mitochondrial respiratory chain complex IV assembly

sentence.text: Lethality was observed in both models due to a combined generation of precursor metabolites and energy and copper deficiency that resulted in a dilated cardiomyopathy.

entity.text: generation of precursor metabolites and energy

sentence.text: cellular copper ion homeostasis was similarly mislocalized to the cytosol in the heart of knockin apoptotic process carrying a homozygous G115S substitution in mitochondrial respiratory chain complex IV assembly, which in humans causes a hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.

entity.text: mitochondrial respiratory chain complex IV assembly
